title: Chicken Tandoori
description: Succulent, smoky, and spice-kissed — Chicken Tandoori is a fiery feast that melts in your mouth!

title: Chicken Tikka Boti
description: ender, smoky, and bursting with bold spices — Tikka Boti is a grill-lovers dream!

title: Chicken Seekh Kabab
description: Sizzling, juicy, and loaded with desi spice — Chicken Seekh Kababs that bring the street food magic to your plate!

title: Chicken Bhuna
description: Slow-cooked chicken in a rich, thick, and spicy masala — Chicken Bhuna is pure comfort in every bite!
